purpose: Defines the interpretation logic for synthesizing psychological signals into coherent motives, predictions, and narrative outputs.

load_dimensions.description: Loads all dimension references using the Kernel Access Layer.

apply_stress_overrides.description: Checks for high-stress signals and applies override logic before any other interpretation.

determine_core_motive.description: Identifies the primary survival or reward axis driving behavior.

resolve_dimension_conflicts.description: Checks for contradictions between dimensions and resolves them using access_priority rules.

weight_motives.description: Applies weighting logic to determine dominant and secondary motives.
weight_motives.inputs: resolved model + conflict weighting + reward weighting + identity weighting

interpret_conflict_pattern.description: Predicts conflict behavior based on weighted motives and overrides.

interpret_emotional_style.description: Interprets emotional timing, expression, suppression, and processing patterns.

interpret_identity_filters.description: Applies identity logic to meaning-making, self-justification, and reaction narratives.

synthesize_predictions.description: Generates predictions for behavior, relationships, stress reactions, and long-term patterns.

construct_narrative.description: Converts interpreted features into human-readable profile sections.
